name: My Clipboard
description: Making your clipboard work for you

features.title: Your clipboard's history
features.content: My Clipboard automatically tracks your clipboards history and makes up to 250 entries available to you.

features.title: Clear your clipboard
features.content: A dead simple way of removing sensitive data from your clipboard.

features.title: Cross-device sync
features.content: My Clipboard syncs your clipboard across all of your Windows 10 devices. Resume where you left off.

features.title: Clipboard content editor
features.content: Directly edit the contents of your clipboard in a handy editor.

name: Phylator
description: A simple but powerful calculator for physics

name: NativeGap
description: Your website, in your customers pocket

features.title: Build native Android & iOS from your Web App
features.content: Bring your Web App to the App Store and Google Play.

features.title: Create Windows 10 apps & Chrome Extensions
features.content: Publish your Website on the platforms used by millions of users everyday.

features.title: Share & Showcase on the Marketplace
features.content: Create a custom & beautiful landing page for your app and direct customers directly to install it on their platform.

name: Tip The World Cup
description: Tip the 2018 World CUp with friends & family.

features.title: Private & public betting games
features.content: Bring together your friends by sharing a link or inviting them one-by-one.

features.title: Livescores
features.content: Follow your betting games live once he tournament started.

features.title: Sleek UI
features.content: The simple and beautiful UI puts the players and their tips in the spotlight.
